about_the_game:
Waking up as a space scientist on a hostile planet. You have nothing with you besides the helmet on your head, and one assignment: to find out what happened and where is the crew of your spaceship...

The Invincible joins the Model Builder family, and together we will resolve this mystery! Thanks to our cooperation, we are launching a FREE DLC with an iconic retro-future helmet! Now it's up to you. Create your story and define how the helmet will look like!

Remember: This content requires the base Model Builder game on Steam in order to play.

About The Invincible
The Invincible is a first-person Sci-Fi thriller set in a retro-future timeline. Waking up as a space scientist on a hostile planet, you embark on a mysterious mission to find the missing crew of your spaceship. Survival is a matter of your correct choices, taken whilst uncovering the secrets of the planet, bigger than anyone thought.

About Model Builder
Join the latest trend in simulation games, bring out your creativity and make awesome looking models. Assemble, customize and display your creations, whether you’re a veteran or a novice. Get building and get creative!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit CPU: Intel Core i5-9400 / Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti / AMD Radeon RX 570, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD /NVMe strongly recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700 / Ryzen 7 3800X
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 8GB NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060S / AMD Radeon RX 5700, or higher
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Modern SSD/NVMe storage recommended - [please check your 'Steam Library Folder' settings to ensure installation on SSD/NVMe where possible, to avoid 'legacy Hard Drive' impacts on load-times / system performance.]
